channel.title: Vykor || Mid-Beta || Enjoyable Gameplay
channel.description:
[center][b][u][i]Vykor is here[/i][/u]![/b][/center]
[center][i]Banner coming soon.[/i][/center]
[center][b]Play Now & Forums[/b][/center] Ready to jump into the action? Download the client here! [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/29233368/Vykor.jar]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/29233368/Vykor.jar[/url] Want to check out our community? View the forums here! [url=http://www.vykor.net/forums/]http://www.vykor.net/forums/[/url]
[center][b]About Vykor[/b][/center] Vykor is a new upcoming server created and founded by, yours truly. Vykor aims to provide the highest quality of gameplay for players to enjoy their time spent online. We aim to create an environment for players to obtain a high total level and a bank load of goodies without ever having to lose their earnings anytime soon. Dedicated hosting, as well as website hosting has been paid for, for a year in advance and by that time will have accumulated enough funding to continue hosting.
[center][b]Vykor status:[/b][/center] Vykor is currently online and in a mid-beta stage. What does this mean? This means while the server is in a 'beta' stage, character accounts will not be reset anytime soon, as all known serious bugs/dupes have been fixed. No reset may be necessary unless serious problems occur.
[center][b]Features[/b][/center] - Toggle-able features, such as gameframes, in-game aesthetic features (etc.). - A well set economy. All drop rates and prices have been set at a standard that leaves players with a sense of accomplishment at the end of the day. - Many bosses to enjoy hours of NPC domination at chances for rare loots! (Godwars, Tormented Demon, etc.) - Various skills to enjoy endless skilling as well as highscores to show off your in-game accomplishments. - In-game PK'ing highscores to show off your skills to everyone! Gain the ladders to become #1. - 100% Bank tabs.
[center][b]Media[/b][/center]
[spoiler]- Summoning features. [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/10x7rkw.png[/img]
- Working fishing at Entrana. [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2na5lxl.png[/img]
- Teleport master, sends you anywhere! [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2niry8h.png[/img]
- Corporeal Beast [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/10pwmci.png[/img]
- Pet Shop [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/nz0l0o.png[/img]
- Lottery! [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/346n8r5.png[/img]
- PK'ing Highscores. (Ugly interface, updated in next client.) [IMG]http://i59.tinypic.com/tak202.jpg[/img]
- Working Bank Tabs! [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/119136u.png[/img] [/spoiler]

Little bump. I’ve started this back, as I had a few rough spots with some exploits.

Read full topic

item.title: Vykor || Mid-Beta || Enjoyable Gameplay
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:4, topic:550310”]Not much to go on here but I wish for the best, I understand this is a BETA or at least in a part of it so I’ll cut some slack in terms of that. I’m also glad to see the forum is at least made, boards are finalized and so on. It’s nice to see that someone (and others do this every once in a blue moon) is prepared and what not.

I wish for the best.[/quote]

Thank you. I, as well as “Zee” from r-s spent countless hours getting those forums up, I refused to even advertise this without some decent looking forums. It’s a must have. However other website pages as well as a homepage is still in development. We do only have a forum board.

Read full topic

item.title: Vykor || Mid-Beta || Enjoyable Gameplay
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Not much to go on here but I wish for the best, I understand this is a BETA or at least in a part of it so I’ll cut some slack in terms of that. I’m also glad to see the forum is at least made, boards are finalized and so on. It’s nice to see that someone (and others do this every once in a blue moon) is prepared and what not.

I wish for the best.

Read full topic

item.title: Vykor || Mid-Beta || Enjoyable Gameplay
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[center]Vykor is here![/center]

[center]Banner coming soon.[/center]

[center]Play Now & Forums[/center]
Ready to jump into the action? Download the client here! https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/29233368/Vykor.jar
Want to check out our community? View the forums here! http://www.vykor.net/forums/

[center]About Vykor[/center]
Vykor is a new upcoming server created and founded by, yours truly. Vykor aims to provide the highest quality of gameplay for players to enjoy their time spent online. We aim to create an environment for players to obtain a high total level and a bank load of goodies without ever having to lose their earnings anytime soon. Dedicated hosting, as well as website hosting has been paid for, for a year in advance and by that time will have accumulated enough funding to continue hosting.

[center]Vykor status:[/center]
Vykor is currently online and in a mid-beta stage. What does this mean? This means while the server is in a ‘beta’ stage, character accounts will not be reset anytime soon, as all known serious bugs/dupes have been fixed. No reset may be necessary unless serious problems occur.

[center]Features[/center]

  • Toggle-able features, such as gameframes, in-game aesthetic features (etc.).
  • A well set economy. All drop rates and prices have been set at a standard that leaves players with a sense of accomplishment at the end of the day.
  • Many bosses to enjoy hours of NPC domination at chances for rare loots! (Godwars, Tormented Demon, etc.)
  • Various skills to enjoy endless skilling as well as highscores to show off your in-game accomplishments.
  • In-game PK’ing highscores to show off your skills to everyone! Gain the ladders to become #1.
  • 100% Bank tabs.

[center]Media[/center]

[spoiler]- Summoning features.

  • Working fishing at Entrana.

  • Teleport master, sends you anywhere!

  • Corporeal Beast

  • Pet Shop

  • Lottery!

  • PK’ing Highscores. (Ugly interface, updated in next client.)

  • Working Bank Tabs!

    [/spoiler]

Read full topic
